# List of _House of Cards_ episodes

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

[![House of
Cards.svg](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/70/House_of_Cards.svg/300px-
House_of_Cards.svg.png)](/wiki/File:House_of_Cards.svg)

_[House of Cards](/wiki/House_of_Cards_\(U.S._TV_series\) "House of Cards
\(U.S. TV series\)")_ is an American [political drama](/wiki/Political_drama
"Political drama") [web television](/wiki/Web_television "Web television")
series created by [Beau Willimon](/wiki/Beau_Willimon "Beau Willimon") for
[Netflix](/wiki/Netflix "Netflix"). The first season, based on the
[BBC](/wiki/BBC "BBC") [miniseries of the same
name](/wiki/House_of_Cards_\(UK_TV_series\) "House of Cards \(UK TV series\)")
and the series of books by [Michael Dobbs](/wiki/Michael_Dobbs "Michael
Dobbs"),[1] premiered exclusively via Netflix's web streaming service on
February 1, 2013.[2]

[Kevin Spacey](/wiki/Kevin_Spacey "Kevin Spacey") stars as Representative
[Francis Underwood](/wiki/Frank_Underwood_\(House_of_Cards\) "Frank Underwood
\(House of Cards\)"), the [Majority Whip](/wiki/Majority_Whip "Majority
Whip"), who, after being passed up for the position of Secretary of State,
initiates an elaborate plan to get himself into a position of greater power,
aided by his wife, [Claire Underwood](/wiki/Claire_Underwood "Claire
Underwood") ([Robin Wright](/wiki/Robin_Wright "Robin Wright")).

As of May 30,
2017,[[update]](//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=List_of_House_of_Cards_episodes&action=edit)
65 episodes of _House of Cards_ have been released, concluding the fifth
season. The series has been renewed for a [sixth and final
season](/wiki/House_of_Cards_\(season_6\) "House of Cards \(season 6\)") that
will consist of eight episodes and be released on November 2, 2018.[3] The
season will not include Spacey, as he was fired from the show due to sexual
misconduct allegations.[4]
